collection.name: Collection Type
collection.description: Indicates whether a collection is "smart" (category) or "manual" (collection).

product.name: Color
product.description: Defines the primary color or pattern, such as blue or striped

product.name: Jewelry type
product.description: Distinguishes between types of jewelry, such as fine or imitation jewelry

product.name: Jewelry material
product.description: Identifies the main material used in jewelry items, such as gold or enamel

product.name: Ring design
product.description: Describes the style of a ring, such as band or solitaire

product.name: Earring design
product.description: Describes the style or structure of earrings, such as hoop or stud

product.name: Search product boosts
product.description: List of search queries for which a product gets higher rank in search results

product.name: Related products settings
product.description: Determines how related products are displayed along with algorithmic product recommendations

product.name: Personalization Themes
product.description: Assigns a product to a personalization option. Used to dynamically display charms and related items

product.name: Primary Category
product.description: Stores the primary category of a product. This helps categorize products when filtering.

product.name: Age group
product.description: Defines the target age range for a product, such as adults or kids

product.name: Ring size
product.description: Specifies the size of a ring, such as L or 6.5

product.name: Collections
product.description: Links a product to a collection.
